backend/main.mo: Defines core data types and maps for salons, bookings, images, and user profiles, includes access control and storage mixins, and seeds default Swiss salon data if empty.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing required frontend overwrites, mechanical fixes, related components, and test IDs for build compliance.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains human‑written summaries of all frontend files detailing their purpose, UI behavior, and functional roles.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies base background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML template mounting the React app at #root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Minimal wrapper that renders and exports AppV1 as the root component.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Large React component defining the full V45 premium UI with salon presets, utilities, and custom card components for the main app experience.
frontend/src/components/AuthHeader.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the AuthHeader component.
Empty file placeholder for the CreateSalonForm component.
frontend/src/components/MemberCard.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the MemberCard component.
frontend/src/components/MonopolyModeSwit: Empty file placeholder for the MonopolyModeSwitch component.
frontend/src/components/MotionButton.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the MotionButton component.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the PremiumBadge component.
frontend/src/components/Pressable.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the Pressable component.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty file placeholder for the ProfileSetupModal component.
frontend/src/components/ProSalonWizard.t: Empty file placeholder for the ProSalonWizard component.
frontend/src/components/ProStudioCreator: Empty file placeholder for the ProStudioCreator component.
frontend/src/components/RevenueChart.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the RevenueChart component.
frontend/src/components/SalonListSection: Empty file placeholder for the SalonListSection component.
frontend/src/components/VipDashboard.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the VipDashboard component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor, refreshing it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, identity restoration, and exposes authentication state to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty file placeholder for backend React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalonImage.ts: Empty file placeholder for salon image handling logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for light/dark themes, scrollbar utilities, safe‑area padding, and multiple animation keyframes/classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loading global styles.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates marketing text for salons using category, type, tags, and city with predefined aura snippets.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors from CSS variables, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, architectural notes, reset directives, and known issues for the system.
